icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for a refined, elegant look

accessibility_checklist: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for normal text
Use semantic HTML (main, nav, aside, section)
All interactive elements must have focus states (ring-2 ring-primary)

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a high-fidelity HRMS. Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum' if possible; use realistic Indian names (e.g., 'Priya Sharma', 'Rahul Verma') and data. Prioritize the 'Soft Utility' aesthetic: clean, white, crisp borders, and deep indigo accents.
instructions_to_main_agent.layout_override: Do not center the main app container. Use a full-width layout with a fixed sidebar on the left and a scrollable main content area on the right.
instructions_to_main_agent.component_usage: Use Shadcn UI components for all interactive elements. Customize them via Tailwind classes to match the 'Soft Utility' theme (e.g., remove excessive rounded corners, keep it 'md').
instructions_to_main_agent.dark_mode: Implement a 'Class' based dark mode. The sidebar should be dark by default in the 'Light' theme to create contrast (Enterprise feel).
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and links.

universal_guidelines.anti_slop: Avoid generic gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle mesh gradients if absolutely necessary. No 'Inter' for headings.
universal_guidelines.spacing: Use 'p-6' or 'p-8' for card padding. Don't cram content.
universal_guidelines.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80' for sticky headers only. Do not use it for main content cards.
